text: @PeteButtigieg tRumpf is not listening to Dr. Fauci. tRumpf has predicted it will magically go away but it hasn’t. Dr. Fauci has said to get the coronavirus contained we need more testing. tRumpf has stopped funding testing, we CAN NOT get this under control until there is more testing.
